https://zerocater.com/careers

ZeroCater brings tens of thousands of people together every day over food. Eating together is a fundamental human experience for us. Shared meals foster relationships and an exchange of ideas. We’re obsessed with helping our customers bring this to their office culture.

Come help us connect people over food! You’ll join a small team of talented full-stack engineers who love to build and love to ship. You’ll work closely with Engineering, Product, and Design teams to build products that delight our customers and impact our entire company. This is a great opportunity for a senior full-stack engineer with prior experience with Django, Rails, or another modern web framework who wants to accelerate their career at a fun, rapidly growing company.

Wanna push FoodTech to production? Contact people@zerocater.com or https://zerocater.com/careers
